pre_caption_prompt: Could you generate a caption for describing this video? You should describe it as detailed as possible.
pre_caption: Two men are standing side by side on a street at night, with trees and buildings in the background. The man on the left, wearing a striped shirt and dark jacket, looks upwards and begins to speak. The man on the right, wearing a brown sweater over a collared shirt, turns his head to the right to look at the man speaking.
